comments.author: sasa@tekovic.com
comments.creator: sasa@tekovic.com
comments.text:
Hi,

I'd like to request the inclusion of Croatian (hr) translation of affiliates website. I've tested the translation at the staging website and everything seem to be in order.

Let me know if there is something to be done before Croatian translation can be included in next release.

I'd also like to know the ETA.

Cheers!
comments.raw_text:
Hi,

I'd like to request the inclusion of Croatian (hr) translation of affiliates website. I've tested the translation at the staging website and everything seem to be in order.

Let me know if there is something to be done before Croatian translation can be included in next release.

I'd also like to know the ETA.

Cheers!

comments.text:
Is it possible to push out translations in between point releases?

// Paul Booker
comments.raw_text:
Is it possible to push out translations in between point releases?

// Paul Booker
comments.author: paul@appcoast.com
comments.creator: paul@appcoast.com

comments.raw_text:
Sasa: We'll be able to give a date later this week once we pin down when to push the 1.1 release of the site live. We'll also be looking into whether we want to have earlier releases for languages.

Paul: See above, we're looking into it.

comments.raw_text:
Eeep! So sorry Sasa. Just the banners. Rhonda, let us know when you can do it. Please include the Aurora button as well (https://etherpad.mozilla.org/ffAurora-affiliate-l10n) - locale HR. 

Once we have those we can roll (assuming there are no other string issues).

The HR buttons are complete for the Aurora set and are up on the server for pickup in the respective zipped folders. 

The request for the mobile, desktop and plug in banners I will be able to turn around by Monday.
:)
--rhonda

comments.author: rhonda@digital-jumpstart.com
comments.text:
Hey Chelsea--
The HR banners for mobile, plugin and desktop are here:
http://www.intothefuzz.com/rhonda/mobile_plugin_banner_ads/HR.zip

One note: for the 468x60 banner and for the 120x240 banners, there were "bubble" versions that had alternate text that did not get requested or translated, just an FYI in case that was overlooked somehow.

Let me know if I need to make any corrections to these. I will also be posting the Aurora versions later.
:)
--rhonda
